name: Star Fox 64 3D
description:
Star Fox 64™ 3D invites players to take on the role of
legendary Fox McCloud as they lead a fearless squadron of fighters in
fierce aerial combat to battle the evil forces of Andross and save the
galaxy from destruction. The rich 3D visuals provide a remarkable sense
of depth, distance and position as players dodge meteors and blast enemy
fighters out of the sky.
